nodes.text: The Ord Cestus medical station was a space station used by the Galactic Republic as the medical facility during the Clone Wars.
It was located near the planet Ord Cestus. Nala Se worked in the medical center. This station looked very similar to the Kaliida Shoals Medical Center also used by the Republic.
In 21 BBY, Jedi Master Kit Fisto was stationed at the site.

In the aftermath of the Second Battle of Geonosis Padawans Ahsoka Tano and Barriss Offee were tasked in bringing a supply ship to the station in order to retrieve medical supplies for Mace Windu's forces on Dantooine. A clone named Scythe brought dozens of brain worm eggs into the Pelta-class frigate and infected the crew. The ship was taken over by the clones, who killed both clone pilots and activated the autopilot and the main bridge shield which prevented anyone going up to the bridge. Tano and Offee managed to gain control back and they safely docked at the center without infecting the people in the station.
